page.title: File -> Revert To Saved
page.introduction: The File->Revert To Saved menu option allows a previously saved, open document/model that has been modified to revert to the previously saved version.
page.operations: If the document has been modified, the message shown above is displayed. The user can choose to discard the changes and revert to the previously saved edition by clicking on Discard Changes button, or cancel the 'Revert To Saved' operation.
